issues: Resume contains special characters (cid:132, cid:239, §, cid:128) that may interfere with ATS parsing.  These should be removed.
Resume uses a mix of bullet points (○) and other formatting. Standardize to bullet points consistently throughout.
recommendations: Use consistent bullet point formatting (e.g., - or •).
Ensure all text is searchable by using common keyword terms.
Use a simple, consistent font style.

issues: Sections could be better structured for clarity and ATS scanning. Consider rearranging sections to improve readability.  Summary/Objective could be improved for impact.
recommendations: Consider a more concise and impactful objective statement.
Reorganize sections for better flow (e.g., Skills before Experience for a skills-focused approach).

issues: Special characters may cause parsing issues.
Heading levels and font sizes may not be consistently applied.
Consider using a standard resume template for consistency.
recommendations: Use clear visual hierarchy to differentiate sections and sub-sections.
Consider using a resume template to enhance readability and consistency.

issues: Phone number and email address are present, but consider adding a LinkedIn profile URL for broader reach.
Consider adding a portfolio URL if available.
recommendations: Add a LinkedIn profile URL and portfolio URL if available.
Ensure contact information is easily scannable and clearly visible.

content_improvements.before: Étudiant en ingénierie de l’intelligence artificielle recherchant un stage de 2-3 mois (juillet 2025) en Machine Learning/Deep Learning, avec un intérêt pour la vision par ordinateur et le NLP. Motivé à contribuer à des projets innovants en analyse d’images et IA.
content_improvements.after: Highly motivated AI Engineering student seeking a 2-3 month internship (July 2025) in Machine Learning/Deep Learning, specializing in computer vision and NLP. Eager to contribute to innovative image analysis and AI projects.

achievements_to_add_modify: Quantify achievements whenever possible (e.g., 'Improved model accuracy by 15%').
Focus on the impact of achievements, not just the tasks performed.
Add more detail to the projects, such as the problem solved, the approach used, and the results obtained.
ats_recommendations: Use keywords relevant to the target job description.
Save the resume as a plain text (.txt) file or a PDF generated from a word processor that is ATS friendly.
Ensure your resume is consistent and easy to read both for human readers and ATS.
